main_definition: Sites can refer to specific locations or places, a collection of websites on the internet, or it could also mean damage caused by something.

meanings_and_examples.example: The archaeologists discovered several ancient sites in the region.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Collection of websites on the internet
meanings_and_examples.example: I manage a website portfolio that includes various e-commerce and news sites.
The storms had left several sites damaged along the coastline.
